Posts.Content: Has anyone out there had a double mastectomy with immediate reconstruction with implants and not getting expanders?
Posts.Title: Immediate reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, my name is Lauren and I was diagnosed with stage 2 breast cancer about 3 weeks ago. I am 29 years old and have not had children but I would like to in the future. I am going to try and have my eggs frozen which was recommended by my doc. I just wanted to know if anyone has any knowledge on this issue? What are the chances of me being fertile after chemo?Â
Posts.Title: fertility after chemo
